modalMessage: Thank you for your feedback! We will review your message and get back to you soon.
unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

categoryMessage.reportUser: Help us maintain a positive experience. Please enter the username of the user you are reporting and describe your complaint.
categoryMessage.customerService: Need help with something? Our customer service team is here to assist you.
categoryMessage.technicalIssues: Encountering technical issues? Please provide details so we can resolve them quickly.
categoryMessage.suggestion: Your feedback is valuable to us! Let us know how we can improve.
categoryMessage.default: Choose a category for your feedback
